Zend_Gdata  
Health  
No 
No 

Description

Service class for interacting with the Google Health Data API

Methods

__construct, getHealthProfileEntry, getHealthProfileFeed, getHealthProfileListFeed, getProfileID, sendHealthNotice, setProfileID,

__construct( Zend_Http_Client   $client = null, string   $applicationId = MyCompany-MyApp-1.0, bool   $useH9Sandbox = false, ) : n/a

Description

Create Zend_Gdata_Health object

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$client Zend_Http_Client | (optional) The HTTP client to use when when communicating with the Google Health servers. null
$applicationId string | The identity of the application in the form of Company-AppName-Version MyCompany-MyApp-1.0
$useH9Sandbox bool | True if the H9 Developer's Sandbox should be used instead of production Google Health. false

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

Description

Retrieve a profile entry object

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$query mixed | The query for the feed, as a URL or Query null

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Health_ProfileEntry

getHealthProfileFeed( mixed   $query = null, ) : Zend_Gdata_Health_ProfileFeed

Description

Retrieve a user's profile as a feed object. If ClientLogin is used, the profile associated with $this->_profileID is returned, otherwise the profile associated with the AuthSub token is read.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$query mixed | The query for the feed, as a URL or Query null

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Health_ProfileFeed

getHealthProfileListFeed( string   $query = null, ) : Zend_Gdata_Feed

Description

Retrieves the list of profiles associated with the user's ClientLogin credentials.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$query string | The query of the feed as a URL or Query object null

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Feed

getProfileID( ) : string

Description

Gets the id of the user's profile

Return value

Type Description
string The profile id

sendHealthNotice( string   $subject, string   $body, string   $bodyType = null, string   $ccrXML = null, ) : Zend_Gdata_Health_ProfileEntry

Description

Posts a new notice using the register feed. This function constructs the atom profile entry.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$subject string | The subject line of the notice
$body string | The message body of the notice
$bodyType string | The (optional) type of message body (text, xhtml, html, etc.) null
$ccrXML string | The (optional) CCR to add to the user's profile null

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Health_ProfileEntry

setProfileID( string   $id, ) : Zend_Gdata_Health

Description

Sets which of the user's profiles will be used

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$id string | The profile ID

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Health Provides a fluent interface

Properties

$_profileID, $_useH9Sandbox, $namespaces,

  private  $_profileID = null

Profile ID used for all API interactions. This can only be set when using ClientLogin for authentication.string


  private  $_useH9Sandbox = false

True if API calls should be made to the H9 developer sandbox at /h9 rather than /healthbool


  public  static $namespaces = array
